mapper.insert: insert into member (memberNumber, memberName, memberEmail, memberPhone, memberPassword, memberStoreName, memberStorePhone, memberStoreCategory, memberPreorder) values (#{memberNumber}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberStoreName}, #{memberStorePhone}, #{memberStoreCategory}, #{memberPreorder})
mapper.select: select memberPassword from member where memberEmail = #{memberEmail}
mapper.update: update member set memberPreorder = #{memberPreorder}} where memberNumber = #{memberNumber}
